properties.name: ledgerr.outbox.batch-size
properties.description: Number of events to process per batch.

properties.name: ledgerr.outbox.enabled
properties.description: Whether the outbox publisher is enabled.

properties.name: ledgerr.outbox.max-retries
properties.description: Maximum retries for failed event publishing.

properties.name: ledgerr.outbox.poll-interval-ms
properties.description: Polling interval in milliseconds for unpublished events.

properties.name: ledgerr.reconciliation.match-window-hours
properties.description: Time window in hours for matching external transactions.

properties.name: ledgerr.reconciliation.schedule-cron
properties.description: Cron expression for scheduled reconciliation runs.

properties.name: ledgerr.security.request-hash-algorithm
properties.description: Algorithm used for request payload hashing (idempotency checks).

properties.name: ledgerr.transaction.max-entries-per-transaction
properties.description: Maximum number of ledger entries allowed per transaction. Prevents excessively large atomic operations.

properties.name: ledgerr.transaction.max-retry-attempts
properties.description: Maximum retry attempts for optimistic locking conflicts.

properties.name: ledgerr.transaction.retry-backoff-ms
properties.description: Base backoff time in milliseconds between retries.
